## isIterable() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Checks if an object is iterable (can be used for `for..of`)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isIterable<T>(obj: any): obj is Iterable<T>
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description                                                                     |
| --------- | ---- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| obj       | any  | the variable to be checkedThis API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice. |

<b>Returns:</b>

obj is Iterable&lt;T&gt;
